kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: Then I Validate that it throws the correct status code(HTTP 200)
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: And I Verify that the result contains Promotions
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: And I Verify that the result contains "Name":"Gallery"
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

Should Contain
